verses.verse: And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1129>Build<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>oxen<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>.

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%>; and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H3320>Stand<s%> by your burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and I will <S%H3212>go<s%>: perhaps the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7136>come<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1697>me<s%>: and whatever he <S%H7200>shows<s%> me I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H3212>you<s%>. And he went to an high <S%H8205>place<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6186>him<s%>, I have prepared <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and I have <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and thus you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5324>him<s%>, and, behold, he stood by his burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, <S%H8269>he<s%>, and all the princes of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has <S%H5148>brought<s%> me from <S%H758>Aram<s%>, out of the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>, <S%H3212>saying<s%>, Come, <S%H779>curse<s%> me <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H3212>come<s%>, <S%H2194>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
<S%H4100>How<s%> shall I <S%H5344>curse<s%>, whom <S%H410>God<s%> has not <S%H6895>cursed<s%>? or how shall I <S%H2194>defy<s%>, whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H2194>defied<s%>?

For from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1389>him<s%>, and from the hills I <S%H7789>behold<s%> <S%H5971>him<s%>: behold, the people shall <S%H7931>live<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%>, and shall not be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Who can <S%H4487>count<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7255>fourth<s%> part of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3477>righteous<s%>, and let my last end be like <S%H319>his<s%>!

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, What have you <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H3947>me<s%>? I took you to <S%H6895>curse<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%>, <S%H1288>and<s%>, behold, you have blessed them <S%H1288>altogether<s%>.
And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, Must I not take <S%H8104>care<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> that which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7760>put<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, Come, I pray <S%H312>you<s%>, with me unto another <S%H4725>place<s%>, from from where you may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7200>them<s%>: you shall see <S%H657>but<s%> the <S%H7097>farthest<s%> part of <S%H7200>them<s%>, and shall not see them <S%H6895>all<s%>: and curse me them from there.

And he <S%H3947>brought<s%> him into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6839>Zophim<s%>, to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H3320>Stand<s%> <S%H3541>here<s%> by your burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, while I <S%H7136>meet<s%> the Lord <S%H3541>yonder<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H7725>again<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and say <S%H1696>thus<s%>.

And when he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5324>him<s%>, behold, he stood by his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> with <S%H1111>him<s%>. And Balak <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>him<s%>, What has the Lord <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%>; <S%H238>listen<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, you son of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%>:

<S%H410>God<s%> is not a <S%H376>man<s%>, that he should <S%H3576>lie<s%>; neither the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, that he should <S%H5162>repent<s%>: has he <S%H559>said<s%>, and shall he not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1696>it<s%>? or has he spoken, and shall he not make it <S%H6965>good<s%>?
<S%H3947>Behold<s%>, I have received commandment to <S%H1288>bless<s%>: and he has <S%H1288>blessed<s%>; and I cannot reverse <S%H7725>it<s%>.

He has not <S%H5027>looked<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, neither has he <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5999>perverseness<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> is with <S%H8643>him<s%>, and the shout of a king is among <S%H4428>them<s%>.
<S%H410>God<s%> brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; he has as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of an <S%H7214>unicorn<s%>.

Surely there is no <S%H5173>enchantment<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, neither is there any <S%H7081>divination<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: according to this <S%H6256>time<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, What has <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6466>worked<s%>!

<S%H5971>Behold<s%>, the people shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> as a great <S%H3833>lion<s%>, and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> himself as a young <S%H738>lion<s%>: he shall not lie <S%H7901>down<s%> until he <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, Neither <S%H5344>curse<s%> them at <S%H6895>all<s%>, nor <S%H1288>bless<s%> them at <S%H1288>all<s%>.

But <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1696>Told<s%> not I <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, All that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%>, that I must <S%H6213>do<s%>?

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, I pray <S%H3947>you<s%>, I will bring you unto <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; perhaps it will <S%H3474>please<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> that you may curse me them from <S%H6895>there<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> unto the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%>, that <S%H8259>looks<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H3452>Jeshimon<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1129>Build<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
